Phrase.Name: Addban Description
Phrase.en: Adds a player to the SourceBans ban list

Phrase.Name: Ban Description
Phrase.en: Bans a player from the server

Phrase.Name: Banip Description
Phrase.en: Bans a player from the server by their IP address

Phrase.Name: Unban Description
Phrase.en: Unbans a player from the server

Phrase.Name: No Perm Ban
Phrase.en: You do not have perm ban permission

Phrase.Name: Unban Disabled
Phrase.en: The unban command is disabled. You must use the Web interface at {1}.

Phrase.Name: You Are Banned
Phrase.en: You have been banned from this server, check {1} for more info

Phrase.Name: Kick Command
Phrase.en: kick {1} "You have been banned from this server, check {2} for more info"
